exec mkdir output
splt --strategy=block schema.hcl output

cmp output/schema.hcl golden/schema.hcl
cmp output/table.hcl golden/table.hcl
cmp output/trigger.hcl golden/trigger.hcl
-- schema.hcl --
schema "public" {
}
table "t1" {
  schema = schema.public
  column "id" {
    type = int
  }
}
table "t2" {
  schema = schema.public
  column "id" {
    type = int
  }
}
trigger "t1_trigger" {
  table = table.t1
  event = "insert"
  function = "f1"
  action = "execute procedure"
}
-- golden/schema.hcl --
schema "public" {
}
-- golden/table.hcl --
table "t1" {
  schema = schema.public
  column "id" {
    type = int
  }
}
table "t2" {
  schema = schema.public
  column "id" {
    type = int
  }
}
-- golden/trigger.hcl --
trigger "t1_trigger" {
  table    = table.t1
  event    = "insert"
  function = "f1"
  action   = "execute procedure"
}
